Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Animation contains mechanism in which to time animations and query easing values for animation frames

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int delay
      The current delay.
      private int duration
      The current duration.
      private AnimationListener listener
      The animation listener.
      private int time
      The current time.
      private javax.swing.Timer timer
      The timer of animation.

      Gives the current position for an ease out bounce animation
